-- | Debugging Tools for Haskell-tools
--   
--   Debugging Tools for Haskell-tools
@package haskell-tools-debug
@version 1.1.0.2

module Language.Haskell.Tools.Debug

-- | Should be only used for testing
demoRefactor :: String -> String -> [String] -> String -> IO ()
forcedTypecheck :: ModSummary -> ParsedModule -> Ghc (Maybe RenamedSource, TypecheckedSource)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic SrcLoc.SrcSpan
instance GHC.Generics.Generic (Language.Haskell.Tools.AST.Ann.NodeInfo sema src)
instance GHC.Show.Show Avail.AvailInfo
